messages.message: anybody knows how to stop kanji? it is trying to update vscode on my laptop and it is taking forever, and I can't access to my IDE to work
reach out to <mailto:ithelp@instabase.com|ithelp@instabase.com> and we’ll be happy to work with you
…likely requires a reboot or us figuring out how to handle a special exemption for you, so feel free to try the reboot first if you like
did it with launchctl and kill, all good now
lol, okay if it worked, though that might be part of why Kandji is hanging if we’re just killing processes

hmm it's been hanging for quite long until I killed it. I think it might have trouble handling the download or something, updating from vscode itself only take a few minutes, I've seen similar behaviors for the OS update as well
